name: Popalicious
description:
Popalicious is a fun and addictive match 3 game for people who like popping delicious stuff. Pop your way through well designed and challenging levels and game modes by connecting the fruits, whenever & wherever you want. Popalicious combines colorful and delicious fruits with the addictive matching gameplay mechanic.

FEATURES

- Easy to play, fun to master
- Colorful and delicious graphics
- 100+ challenging and well designed levels.
- Pick up&Play
- Unique gameplay with different game modes.
- Free to play

GAME MODES

- Time Attack
- Collect the Blocks
- Destroy the Bombs
- Break the Cages
- Collect the Ingredients
